title: Build a better bag lunch
creator_credit: Stephen Wallen and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Shows in a humurous and playful way that packed lunches can vary in content and style every day, and that the packed lunch can help control one’s salt, sugar and fat intake. Suggests many combinations of fillings from the main food groups, and shows the important role of vacuum containers. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
